snippet: Hasbro reported an unexpected gain in sales on strong demand for its Transformers, Nerf and Marvel toys, while Halliburton, the oil and gas services company, posted results that exceeded analysts’ predictions.
abstract: Stock market rebounds from large loss and makes gains due to strong first-quarter reports from variety of companies.
lead_paragraph: Hasbro reported an unexpected gain in sales on strong demand for its Transformers, Nerf and Marvel toys, while Halliburton, the oil and gas services company, posted results that exceeded analysts’ predictions.

headline.main: Market Closes Higher as Earnings Impress
headline.print_headline: Market Rebounds on Encouraging Earnings From Hasbro and Halliburton
